#### Eculidean Distance Using R
<br>

```{r}

set.seed(123)
Mat <- matrix(rnorm(40, 2, 2) |> round(2), 2, 20)
head(Mat)

euclidean <- function(a, b) sum((a - b)^2)

euclidean(Mat[1, ], Mat[2, ])

```
